plant_needs.name: Abelia dielsii
plant_needs.blooming: Flowering period May, fruiting period August-September
plant_needs.soil: Acidic soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
plant_needs.sunlight: Like sunshine, resistant to half shade
plant_needs.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
plant_needs.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
plant_needs.pruning: Remove dead, rotten, diseased leaves and the parts that may affect the good appearance
